name: Man of Dice
description:
**IMPORTANT**: View sensitivity is broken on low framerates. You will most likely need to lower your mouse sensitivity in your pc's settings to play properly. A fix will be released immediately after the voting period ends.

You know grenade jumping? Well that's this game. Each die will explode with a random strength depending on which number is rolled. The objective is to reach the top, in as little time as possible.

Current best time: 1:42.59
